response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This item is truly exceptional and holds immense value for us at $15,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and value while also providing you with a significant advantage over the market price. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 13000}
